amendment.description: Amendment places restrictions on using funds in title III to provide assistance relating to any housing or project located, or to be located, in the City of Galt, California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 as printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in the bill to provide assistance to any housing program located in the City of Galt, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
